explains: n. （尤指男性）发言人，代言人

sentences.en: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.cn: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

sentences.en: Their spokesman declined to comment on the allegations.
sentences.cn: 他们的发言人拒绝对这些指控加以评论。

sentences.en: A spokesman dismissed any suggestion of a boardroom rift.
sentences.cn: 发言人的话打消了人们关于董事会不和的所有推测。
